page.title: 12A school day (1)
page.content: On a typical school day I get up at 07.30 hrs. I have a shower and then put on my school uniform. This consists of a black skirt, white blouse, black jumper, socks and shoes. Before leaving home I have breakfast and watch television. At 08.30 hrs. I leave for school. At 08.55 hrs. a school bell rings to call us to our form rooms. Luckily I can sit with one of my friends. She is nice, quiet and shares the same interests. Today, Wednesday, we stay with our Form Tutor for Geography. I do not like this subject and I am not very good at it. This lesson lasts for 40 minutes. At 09.50 hrs. the bell goes for Music. After Music the bell goes for break. During this time we can talk, buy tuck and use the toilets. After break I go to Religious Education where we write out parts of
